price: 13 Ils n’y croiront donc pas, bien que soit connu de tous le sort réservé aux peuples du passé.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
